title: Tender for Supply of Sodium Chloride Intravenous Infusion BP 0.9 % w/v 500ml  (6,000,000 Bottles)
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), to the lowest responsive bidder,  was approved by the Cabinet.
